DESC.PARA: A model for gamma-ray burst continuum spectra developed by D. Band, et. al., 1993 (ApJ 413, 281).

PARA.EQUATION: A(E) = K [(alpha-beta) temp/100.]^(alpha-beta) (E/100.)^beta exp[-(alpha-beta)] for E > (alpha-beta)*temp

DESC.PARA: where E is in units of keV.
This is an additive model component.

ROW.DATA: K; normalization constant; K' is set to provide a continuous model at E=(alpha-beta)*temp

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7.1 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.1.

BUGS.PARA: For a list of known bugs and issues with the XSPEC models, please visit the XSPEC bugs page.
